label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Shrinesare now vulnerable after a T3 tower dies (same as the Shrines inside the base), rather than after all T2 towers die

label: Helm of the Dominator
descriptionHtml:
• Helm of the Dominator All Stats from 6 to 4
  • Helm of the Dominator creeps now give a constant 125 gold bounty

label: Silver Edge
descriptionHtml: • Shadow Walk damage for Silver Edge from 225 to 200

descriptionHtml: • Tome of Knowledge additional XP per used Tome from 100 to 135
